channel.title: MW2 Best Classes
channel.description:
What is your primary MW2 class that is universal to the type of match. When i say "universal" i mean you could use it all the time and maintain a decent Kill to Death ratio.
Use this as your guide [code] Primary - Secondary - Grenade - Spec. Grenade - Perk 1 - Perk 2 - Perk 3 - Death Streak - Kill Streak -[/code]
Primary - Scar w/ silencer Secondary - Thumper X2 Grenade - Santex Spec. Grenade - Flash Perk 1 - Slight of Hand Perk 2 - Cold Blooded Perk 3 - Ninja Death Streak - Martyrdom Kill Streak - UAV, Care Package, Attack Helicopter

item.title: MW2 Best Classes
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:18, topic:370174”][quote author=riku9182 link=topic=466289.msg3410399#msg3410399 date=1290638759]
Primary -Intervention/FMJ
Secondary -Desert Eagle FMJ
Grenade -Semtex
Spec. Grenade - Flash Bang
Perk 1 - Sleight of Hand Pro
Perk 2 - Stopping Power Pro
Perk 3 - Steady Aim Pro
Death Streak - Juggernaut
Kill Streak - Pred Missle, Harriers, AC130

Q-Scope for the win >.>
[/quote]
Steady aim is for bads.[/quote]
Not for No-Scoping it isnt

Read full topic

item.title: MW2 Best Classes
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

rimary - F2000 Silencer or Extended Mags
Secondary - USP FMJ
Grenade - Semtex
Spec. Grenade - Flash Bang
Perk 1 - Marathon Pro
Perk 2 - Stopping Power Pro
Perk 3 - Steady Aim Pro
Death Streak - Juggernaut
Kill Streak - UAV, Predator, Harrier

Yes, I’m one of those people who can devastate with the F2000.

M1014 Grip (reduces draw time)
Semtex
Stun Grenade
Scavenger Pro

Ninja Pro
Copycat (never use deathstreaks)

item.title: MW2 Best Classes
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Well I’m on black ops but i used to use:
Primary - MP5k w/ Silencer
Secondary - RPG-7 or M93 w/ Akimbo
Grenade - Semtex
Spec. Grenade - Flashbangs or Stun Grenades
Perk 1 - Marathon
Perk 2 - Stopping Power
Perk 3 - Ninja
Death Streak - Any but Last Stand
Kill Streak - Predatior, Harriers, Nuke.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Primary - Intervention FMJ
Secondary - USP .45 Akimbo
Grenade - Throwing Knife
Spec. Grenade - Stun Grenade
Perk 1 - Sleight of Hand Pro
Perk 2 - Stopping Power Pro
Perk 3 - Commando Pro
Death Streak - Final Stand
Kill Streak - Predator, Harriers, AC130/ChopperGunner

Primary - UMP45 Silenced
Secondary - USP .45 Tatical Knife
Grenade - Semtex
Spec. Grenade - Stun Grenade
Perk 1 - Marathon Pro
Perk 2 - Lightweight
Perk 3 - Commando Pro
Death Streak - Final Stand
Kill Streak - Predator, Harriers, Emergency Airdrop/AC130/Chopper Gunner

Primary - Scar-H silenced
Secondary - M1014 FMJ
Grenade - Claymore
Spec. Grenade - Stun Grenade
Perk 1 - Scavenger Pro
Perk 2 - Stopping Power/Hardline
Perk 3 - Commando Pro
Death Streak - Final Stand
Kill Streak - Harriers, AC130/Chopper Gunner/Nuke

Primary - Riot Shield
Secondary - RPG
Grenade - C4
Spec. Grenade - Stun Grenade
Perk 1 - Scavenger
Perk 2 - Danger Close
Perk 3 - Ninja
Death Streak - Final Stand
Kill Streak - UAV, Care Package, Predator Missile

^ Mostly for Search and Destroy

Fuck yeah i’m organized

item.title: MW2 Best Classes
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Primary - Intervention/Barret .50 w/ FMJ
Secondary - Spaz-12 w/ FMJ
Grenade - Semtex
Spec. Grenade - Smoke
Perk 1 - Sleight of Hand
Perk 2 - Stopping Power
Perk 3 - Ninja
Death Streak - Final Stand
Kill Streak - Care Package, Predator, Harriers

Also got:

Primary - Riot Shield
Secondary - PP2000 w/ extended mags
Grenade - Blast Shield
Spec. Grenade - Stun Grenades
Perk 1 - Sleight of Hand
Perk 2 - Stopping Power
Perk 3 - Ninja

Put the blast shield on when you’re walking around, as it removes the headshot bonus & effects from stun grenades, put the riot shield on your back, and drop shot people with the PP2000, then trade the PP2000 for guns you find on the ground.

Read full topic
